name: The amicable fellow
description:
Run to earn more friends. Spend charisma points to be more effective at earning friends.

Created within 45 hours for local game jam Vasaras spēļu zapte 2020.

Instructions

- space to jump

- press appropriate key when near a person to add them as a friend

- left and right arrow keys to move

Resources used

* characters and animations - self-made

* backgrounds - various classical paintings and creative commons photos

* music - main theme by Ogotu, fast paced theme by bigmanjoe

* sfx - various creative commons 

* voice acting - by Ogotu and friends

Team

Mentor: Sīmanis (programming, art)

Team: Arvis (programming), Ogotu (music, sfx)

Windows installation:

1. Uzip downloaded file

2. Launch Zapte.exe
